title: Glow Watch Face
summary: A minimal watch face for Android Wear, with glow effect, digital & analog
developerAddress:
5 Square des Villebenettes
Les Grandes Terres
78160 Marly-Le-Roi
description: Simple. Clear. Minimal. Customizable.Analog and digital at the same time : - Analog by the hours and minutes hands- Digital by the digits hidden inside the drawn at the edgeCustomizable from the wear app and from the mobile app :- Glow color, intensity- Hands aspect, length, width, stroke...- Edge aspect, stroke, position...- 3-taps application to launch
descriptionHTML:
Simple. Clear. Minimal. Customizable.

Analog and digital at the same time :
- Analog by the hours and minutes hands
- Digital by the digits hidden inside the drawn at the edge

Customizable from the wear app and from the mobile app :
- Glow color, intensity
- Hands aspect, length, width, stroke...
- Edge aspect, stroke, position...
- 3-taps application to launch
comments: Very simple and nice. I didn't know of the hidden digital time and must say it shows good creativity on the part of the author.
recentChanges: Many settings are now available on wear app and phone app !
